project_description: An image upscaler that runs on Oracle Cloud. A local Python script executes the upscaling script on an Oracle Cloud instance, copies the files back to the local machine, and cleans up the files on the Oracle Cloud instance.
task_todo_list: Create a local Python script to execute the script on the Oracle Cloud instance.
Copy the upscaled files back to the local machine.
Clean up the files on the Oracle Cloud instance.
Add instructions for finding gcloud and Oracle Cloud secrets.
